name: Downsample
description: Removes data points from a set to make it more manageable. Uses a set method such as integer factor.

properties.name: seed
properties.description: Seed for random number generation. If NULL, a random seed is taken.

properties.name: min_n
properties.description: Minimal sample size for downsampling. For each category, the minimal value between the category sample size and min_n will be taken for downsampling.
